properties.address: The Parish Council Community Centre, West Yorkshire WF7 7JH
properties.description: We are a Community Library and a Community Social Hub. We welcome everyone members and non members. We have a suite of 4 computers for public use and have public wifi. For a small cost we supply hot and cold drinks , biscuits and occasionally cake. We were part of the WMDC warm Space project which we received funding for, we will not be receiving funding from WMDC again this year but would still like to provide a warm space but being a charity cannot afford to do this free of charge to the public without funding.
properties.title: Ackworth Community Library

properties.address: Snack and Chat Airedale Library, West Yorkshire WF10 3JJ
properties.description: We run a day session with free refreshments, games, crafts, and hobbies. with this we do offer a 2 course meal for £5.00 if wish to book in. We are looking at a light lunch (soup and a roll ) for £2.50.
properties.title: Airedale fun, friends and laughter

properties.address: Doncaster Metropolitan Borough Council, South Yorkshire DN6 0JA
properties.description: The space is open to all
properties.title: Askern Community Hub

properties.address: Cedars Family Hub, Barnsley Road , Hemsworth , West Yorkshire WF9 4PU
properties.description: Welcome spaces in family hubs Children, young people and their families will find a warm welcome at their local hub. The family and youth hubs offer a range of free activities and events to take part in. Raising a family can be challenging, but know that when you need support, there are people and places on hand who can talk to you to find the help you need. On the What’s on Guide, welcome space sessions will be listed as either Coffee Morning or Family Activity. Family hubs can offer free of charge: •Stay and play sessions •Young Carers groups •Connect Café – access to computers and the internet Find your local family hub and view their What’s on Guide’s https://www.wakefieldfamiliestogether.co.uk/family-hubs/
properties.title: Cedars Family Hub

properties.address: Wakefield Metropolitan District Council, West Yorkshire WF7 5BB
properties.description: A lunch group will open its doors to anyone that would like a warm drink and warm welcome at the council community hall in Featherstone Library on a Monday 11-2pm
properties.title: Featherstone

properties.address: Wakefield Metropolitan District Council, West Yorkshire WF7 5BB
properties.description: A lunch group is opening its doors to anyone in the community to come and join the warm welcoming group and partake in activities or simply enjoy a hot drink and a chance to access a light lunch at affordable costs.
properties.title: Featherstone foodies

properties.address: Kinsley & Fitzwilliam Learning & Community Centre, West Yorkshire WF9 5BP
properties.description: A day session with activities , talks, hobbies, games and community work groups, Veteran centre. Free refreshments with Lunch to a cost for 2 course @£5.00 on booking. £2.50 for soup and a roll
properties.title: Fitzwilliam Centre

properties.address: Snack and Chat Cafe, West Yorkshire WF10 3JJ
properties.description: Lunch group opens it doors to anyone that would like to join us for a warm and welcome space to receive free hot drinks and a ability to purchase a low cost light lunch if required while we run our session for the day in the venue
properties.title: Fun food and laughter Airedale Group
